sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Walt Disney ( DIS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Walt Disney registers a 8.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 0.9%.
Travelers Companies is lower by about 0.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.6%, and Nike ( NKE ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
